title: minions
body: all im gunna say is please remove minion collision.

replies.body: cuz when your trying to like q a champ you hit a minion instead and they escape when there like 10 hp

> [{quoted}](name=lel420blazinit,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4xIKUBxE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-02-24T07:26:45.508+0000)
>
> cuz when your trying to like q a champ you hit a minion instead and they escape when there like 10 hp

so you want to remove minion collision because of your bad aim?
ahhhhhhhhhhh not kinda its when there a "wall" of minions and your trying to kill your enemy is the problem

> [{quoted}](name=lel420blazinit,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4xIKUBxE,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-24T07:30:56.842+0000)
>
> ahhhhhhhhhhh not kinda its when there a "wall" of minions and your trying to kill your enemy is the problem

so you want one of the most basic means of counterplay which is "stand behind your minions" to be removed because of your terrible aim?
